page.title: 04EDUCATION READING SCHEME
page.content: {Ginn 360}is a{reading scheme}which improves reading, comprehension and memory. All the set books and extension readers are kept on a trolley with the work cards for each book. Catalogue cards help children to find the books and cards easily. We (Colin and Robert) push the trolley round to the seven first year classes. Each class uses it twice a week. How we use the scheme. First we find a book and the work sheets to go with it, then we read the book carefully before answering the questions in the work book. Finally we do the cards, mark our work and go on to the next book. There is also a record sheet which we mark (by colouring in squares) to show exactly where we are in the scheme. We shall continue to use the same scheme in our second year at school.
